item.title: Bruce Springsteen - Born in the USA
item.description:
For educational use.
Chords Used: C, F
Born in the USA by Bruce Springsteen. It’s been digitally raised by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along. The chords have been added to a lyric video by YouTuber TheFreak093, which may be found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O3lmb... . If I were teaching this I would be tempted to turn off the projector and work with counting 16 beats of each chord (changing ever 16 beats from C to F).
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: The Mormon Tabernacle Choir - Anchors Aweigh
item.description:
For educational use.
The US Navy Song. It's just the chorus, and it's been digitally altered to lower the pitch 3 semitones so beginner ukulele player can learn the song. There are chords, the melody line, lyrics, and ukulele tab.
I recommend using https://youloop.io/ to slow it down and isolate phrases / measures to work on.
Here are the links to Uke Play Alongs all of the US Military Songs… Army - https://youtu.be/TmDAE590uoM Navy - https://youtu.be/e8VI857L4Vc Air Force - https://youtu.be/43gjtd783q8 Marines - https://youtu.be/yYqlXKRdFW0 Coast Guard - https://youtu.be/d4jyOXkH3TA

item.title: US Army Song - The Army Goes Rolling Along - Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use.
The first verse and refrain of the US Army's Song, The Army Goes Marching Along. It is also known as the US Army Anthem, and as The Caissons Go Rolling Along. There are chords, the melody line, lyrics, and ukulele tab. The pitch has been raised one whole step (from Bb to C) to make the melody work on uke. The many passing chords playing by the band have been simplified for this play along.
I recommend using https://youloop.io/ to slow it down and isolate phrases / measures to work on.
Here are the links to Uke Play Alongs all of the US Military Songs… Army - https://youtu.be/TmDAE590uoM Navy - https://youtu.be/e8VI857L4Vc Air Force - https://youtu.be/43gjtd783q8 Marines - https://youtu.be/yYqlXKRdFW0 Coast Guard - https://youtu.be/d4jyOXkH3TA
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. item.title: Studio bandet - Deep on the heart of texas
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Deep In The Heart Of Texas on the ukulele by American Patriots. The chords used are C G7.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
▶ Check out my gear on Kit: https://kit.com/AndyRamos

item.title: Lee Greenwood - God Bless The USA
item.description:
For educational use.
Lee Greenwood singing God Bless The USA, with the pitch raised 1 whole step so beginner ukulele students can play along.
Lyric video by YouTuber “Jesus4Life” (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MYvUmhqa104).

item.title: You’re a Grand Old Flag Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of F.
Happy Flag Day, everyone! (At least to citizens of the United States of America.) Uploaded on Flag Day, 2018.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.
